document.docAuthor: Brescovit, Antonio D., Ruiz, Alexander Sánchez & Garcia, Giraldo Alayón
document.docTitle: Antilloides haitises Brescovit, Ruiz & Garcia, 2016, new species
document.masterDocTitle: The Filistatidae in the Caribbean region, with a description of the new genus Antilloides, revision of the genus Filistatoides F. O. P. - Cambridge and notes on Kukulcania Lehtinen (Arachnida, Araneae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The Filistatidae in the Caribbean region, with a description of the new genus Antilloides, revision of the genus Filistatoides F. O. P. - Cambridge and notes on Kukulcania Lehtinen (Arachnida, Araneae)

,

Types .
Holotype male and paratype female from Cueva Lines, Parque Nacional Los Haitises (
19 ° 2 ’ 38 ”N
69 ° 35 ’ 34.43 ”W
), Sabana de la Mar, Hato Mayor Province, Dominican Republic ,
12 .V. 2012
, I. Agnarsson col., deposited in NMNH . Paratypes : male and female same data as holotype , deposited in IBSP 166719 .

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 13 A‒C.
Antilloides cubitas
n. sp.
, female from Sierra Cubitas , Camaguey, Cuba. A. Habitus, dorsal. B. Same, lateral. C. Spermathecae, dorsal. Abbreviations: cd = neck; r = receptacula.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Other material examined. DOMINICAN REPUBLIC . Hato Mayor Province : Sabana de la Mar, Parque Nacional Los Haitises , Cueva Lines (
19 ° 2 ' 38 "N
69 ° 35 ' 34.43 "W
), 4 ♀,
12 .V. 2012
, I. Agnarsson col. ( NMNH DR08); Parque Nacional Los Haitises , Cueva Arena (
19 ° 3 ' 29.6 "N
69 ° 27 ' 12.3 "W
), 2 ♀ 3 imm.,
12 .VI. 2012
, I. Agnarsson col. ( NMHN DR07), Ditto, 2 ♀ ( IBSP 166720 ). Pedernales Province : Hoyo de Pelempito, Boca Cosón (
18 ° 8 ' 12 "N
71 ° 31 ' 17 "W
),
426 m .
, 1 ♀ 1 imm.,
26 .VII. 2012
, C. Marte & G. de Los Santos col. ( MNHNSD 09.1333).
Etymology. The specific name is a noun in apposition taken from the type locality.

Diagnosis .
Antilloides haitises
n. sp.
is distinguished from other species by tibial spines shorter than the cymbium and an embolus that is slender at the tip (
Figs 14 C‒D
16 A‒H
,
20 E‒F
). The females differ by the elongated and very large uterus externus and the enlarged necks of the spermathecae (
Figs 14 E
,
20 G
).

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 14A‒E.
Antilloides haitises
n. sp. ,
male (Holotype NMNH). A. Habitus, dorsal. B. Habitus, female (Paratype NMNH). C. Male palp. prolateral. D. Same, retrolateral. E. Spermathecae, dorsal view. Abbreviations: r = receptacula; ue = uterus externus.

FIGURE 15A‒H.
Antilloides haitises
n. sp. ,
female (NMNH DR08). A. Mouthparts, ventral. B. Right endites and chelicerae, distal area. C. Right endite, serrula. D. Leg III, tarsus, chemosensory setae and sensilla distal, dorsal. E. Leg. IV, dorsal sensillae and tarsal organ. F. Same, tarsal organ, detail. G. Leg III, Tarsal organ and sensilla grouped, dorsal. H. Calamistrum, three rows, dorsal.

FIGURE 16A‒H.
Antilloides haitises
n. sp.
male (IBSP 166719), palp. A. Prolateral. B. Retro-dorsal. C. Cymbium and embolus, distal area, prolateral. D. Apical. E. Ventro-prolateral. F. Embolus, distal. G. Retrolateral. H. Bulb, ventral.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Female. ( Paratype MNHNCu). Coloration as in male, except carapace reddish and legs gray with sparse black stripes ( 14 B). Total length 4.0. Carapace length 1.6 , width 1.1 . PME separated by their diameter. Palp measurements: femur 0.9 long, patella 0.4 long. Leg measurements: I femur 1.7 / patella 0.6 / tibia 1.9 / metatarsus 1.2 / tarsus 1.0/ total 6.4 ; II 1.3 / 0.6 / 1.0/ 0.7 / 0.6 / 4.2 ; III 1.0/ 0.5 / 0.7 / 0.6 / 0.6 / 3.0; IV 1.5 / 0.6 / 1.3 / 1.1 / 0.7 / 5.2 . Abdomen 2.3 long. Spermathecae oval (
Figs 14 E
,
20 G
).
Natural history . All specimens were collected by hand on the walls inside of caves at Parque Nacional Los Haitises .

Distribution. Known only from Dominican Republic (
Fig. 22
A).
